Literature.Title: Rational design of novel amphipathic antimicrobial peptides focused on the distribution of cationic amino acid residues.
Literature.Author: Misawa T, Goto C, Shibata N, Hirano M, Kikuchi Y, Naito M, Demizu Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=25 µM,Human Lung Fibroblasts:100% Cytotoxicity=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=6.25µM),Escherichia coli NBRC 3972(MIC=6.25µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=12.5µM),Proteus vulgaris NBRC 3045(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 13275(MIC=6.25µM)
